underlying_goal: Read and summarize Chapter 1 of 'Building Applications with AI Agents' from O'Reilly Learning using Playwright, and create a well-organized Obsidian markdown document suitable for sharing in a team seminar
friction_detail: Initial login issue required user intervention, and Claude asked too many clarifying questions (approach A vs B, audience level) before user interrupted to just continue.
brief_summary: User wanted Claude to scrape an O'Reilly book chapter via Playwright and produce a seminar-ready Obsidian summary; Claude successfully navigated the page after a login hiccup and created a structured markdown document.
